hymn.title: Unto Him who loves us ever

layout.singingstanza: Un -- to Him who loves us ev -- er, Pi -- ties us and grants us grace, Shed His blood for our re -- demp -- tion Sac -- ri -- fic -- ing in our place— May the pow -- er, glo -- ry, king -- dom Be e -- ter -- nal -- ly His place.

lyrics.stanza: Unto Him who loves us ever, Pities us and grants us grace, Shed His blood for our redemption Sacrificing in our place— May the power, glory, kingdom Be eternally His place.
